Activity: Check emails and respond to any urgent requests. Get some coffee. Start the day.
Start creating a library of animations for basic movements. Begin with the idle animation, focusing on subtle movements and natural breathing.
Animate the character's walk cycle, paying close attention to timing and weight distribution. Use reference videos of human walking to ensure realism. Ask @tart-1 if he has any good reference.
Create a run cycle animation, adjusting the timing and pose to reflect the increased speed. Ensure the animation is smooth and believable.
Lunch Time! Get some food and chat with colleagues.
Animate the character's jump animation, paying attention to the anticipation, takeoff, and landing. Add some squash and stretch to the animation for added impact.
Create animations for basic combat actions like punching and kicking. Focus on creating dynamic and impactful movements.
Review the day's progress, make notes on areas for improvement, and back up all files to the server.
